item.title: Creative Agency Team (Assit. Creative Director/Designer) - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone that fits as apart of my start up digital marketing agency team.
This person will fill in as Assistant Creative Director but also be fluent/experienced in graphic design, photo/video editing, basic digital marketing, photography/videography playbook creation.
Our target clients will be hospitality groups/companies, fitness businesses, and luxury wellness brands. So experience in either of these helps as well.
Keep in mind our agency is just lifting off from ground zero so someone looking to grow with a team of like minded professionals and build a industry leading agency would be best fit.
Look forward to working with you!


Hourly Range: $15.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:32 UTC
Category: Creative Direction
Skills:Ad Campaign, Creative Brief, Video Commercial, Digital Ad Campaign, Advertising Strategy, Brand Design, Graphic Design, Creative Strategy, Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Ad Campaign, Creative Brief, Video Commercial, Digital Ad Campaign, Advertising Strategy, Brand Design, Graphic Design, Creative Strategy, Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistance (Dance related Video Content Creation) - Upwork
item.description:
Virtual Assistance with own background of Dance Choreographers/Dancers/Models/INSTA reels maker.

If you are a female and a dancer or own reel maker then please apply to this post as its about getting video content creation work with you appearing in it. Please apply with some samples of your work that you may have done on your own INSTA/FB or YouTube channel.

Additionally having video editing background is desired. You should be have good awareness of social media and related content building.,,

The key requirement is to provide 1 dance sequence (of approx. 2 min duration) on 1 song audio (in HINDI language) provided by us. Further details will be provided on upWork zoom call for the shortlisted candidate(s).

Note: Dont over quote the price to get ignored. Thanks.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:08 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:YouTube Shorts, Virtual Assistance, Video Production
Skills: YouTube Shorts, Virtual Assistance, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: After Effects Social Media Editior - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:
We are seeking a talented and experienced After Effects editor to create dynamic visuals for our upcoming promotional campaign. The goal is to produce engaging, high-energy content that will capture our audience's attention and convey the unique value of our product/brand. The visuals will be used across various digital platforms, including social media, our website, and online advertisements.

Project Objectives:

Engage Audience: Create visually striking and memorable content that resonates with our target audience.
Brand Alignment: Ensure the visuals are consistent with our brand identity and messaging.
High Quality: Produce high-resolution, professional-quality animations and effects.
Versatility: Develop content that can be easily adapted to different formats and platforms.
Key Deliverables:

Intro Animation: A 10-15 second animated introduction that sets the tone for the campaign.
Product Highlight Video: A 30-second video showcasing the key features and benefits of our product.
Social Media Snippets: Five 5-10 second clips optimized for social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter).
Banner Animations: Three animated banners for use on our website and in online advertisements.
Custom Transitions: Unique transitions to be used in future video content to maintain brand consistency.
Scope of Work:

Storyboard Development: Collaborate with our creative team to develop detailed storyboards for each deliverable.
Asset Creation: Design and animate all necessary assets, including text, graphics, and visual effects.
Editing and Compositing: Seamlessly integrate animations with existing footage and audio.
Revisions: Provide up to three rounds of revisions based on feedback from our team.
Required Skills and Experience:

Proven experience as an After Effects editor with a strong portfolio showcasing dynamic visuals.
Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, and other relevant software.
Strong understanding of motion graphics, visual effects, and animation principles.
Ability to work collaboratively and communicate effectively with our team.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work on time.


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Transition, Audio Editing, Instagram Reels, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, 360-Degree Video Editing, Highlighting Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Transition, Audio Editing, Instagram Reels, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, 360-Degree Video Editing, Highlighting Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Monetization Specialist for Faceless Cash Cow Channel - Upwork
item.description:
### Job Description:

I am looking for a YouTube Monetization Specialist to help start a faceless cash cow YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have experience creating and managing YouTube channels that generate revenue through engaging, high-quality content.

### Responsibilities:
- Develop a strategy for creating and growing a faceless YouTube channel.
- Research and create engaging content ideas.
- Optimize videos for SEO (titles, descriptions, tags, thumbnails).
- Use YouTube Analytics to track performance and make data-driven decisions.
- Implement strategies to reach monetization requirements (1,000 subscribers and 4,000 watch hours).

### Requirements:
- Proven experience managing successful YouTube channels, preferably faceless ones.
- Strong understanding of YouTube algorithms, SEO, and monetization.
- Ability to create high-quality content that attracts viewers.
- Excellent communication skills and a commitment to transparency and fairness.
- Familiarity with video editing software and tools.

### How to Apply:
Please apply with:
- A brief overview of your experience.
- Examples of YouTube channels you have managed or grown.
- Your proposed strategy for launching and growing a faceless cash cow channel.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:01 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Content Creation, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Marketing Strategy, Internet Marketing
Skills: Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Content Creation, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Marketing Strategy, Internet Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Premium Facebook Ad Video Editing (Live TV Production Standard) Contract Basis! - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking to partner with a PREMIUM VIDEO EDITOR who has experience in editing FB & IG adverts to be engaging.

You must be comfortable in sourcing and choosing high production b roll footage. You must understand the psychology of an epic ad and ensure the editing make the video engaging and keep the stick rate high throughout the video.     

Videos are usually 2-3 mins long. Must be able to turn work around within 2 business days on all projects and deliver high quality work the first time. We do not want to have to proof read or check the work for errors, you must take responsibility for this.

We will do the initial brief and you will take creative control, making sure you understand our brand, making it stand out in the market.

Please send examples of your previous high end work. This could be FB ads, or simply other video creative projects that display these skills. If you've worked on short films, TV or similar, this is the standard we are looking for, which includes high quality work first time, but also edit free work.


Contract hourly basis, ongoing work for the right person. Pre work interview before engaging.



Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Videography, Facebook Advertising, Quality Assurance
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Videography, Facebook Advertising, Quality Assurance
Country: Australia
click to apply
